The allows to configure the style of the diagram. This setting allows to specify a file which will define the custom style for the diagram.
The customGraphStyles.xsd specifies the grammar of the xml file specifying the custom style.
There are several element nodes for the different types of Owl/RDF elements:
The class is used for the representation of a Class
The package is used for the representation of a
The individual is used for the representation of an Individual
The property is used for the representation of a Data property
The externalPackage is used for the representation of an external packahe when exporting the content of a package
Under each of this element:
The background element represents the color of the background of the box representing the element. note that this color can be specified as an html color name (for example "Yellow"), or its hexadecimal representation (for example: "#2D2D2D")
The showInnerGraphDisplay property can be used for the package element and specifies if the inner graph display should be shown for the Yed export
You don't need to specify all the elements. Those which are not specified will have a default value.
<customStyles> <element type="class"> <background color="Yellow" /> </element> <element type="property"> <background color="Red" /> </element> <element type="package"> <property key="showInnerGraphDisplay" value="true"/> </element> </customStyles>
